eds.metrics module¶

eds.metrics.avg_error(Y: numpy.array, Y_hat: numpy.array) → float¶

Average of the FPR and FNR.

Ynp.array

Array of true labels

Y_hatnp.array

Array of predicted labels

float

Average of the FPR and FNR.

eds.metrics.false_negative_rate(Y: numpy.array, Y_hat: numpy.array) → float¶

False negative rate of the predictions. Also known as type II error rate.

Ynp.array

Array of true labels

Y_hatnp.array

Array of predicted labels

float

False negative rate

eds.metrics.false_positive_rate(Y: numpy.array, Y_hat: numpy.array) → float¶

False positive rate of the predictions. Also known as type I error rate.

Ynp.array

Array of true labels

Y_hatnp.array

Array of predicted labels

float

False positive rate

eds.metrics.mse(Y: numpy.array, Y_hat: numpy.array) → float¶

Mean squared error of the prediction. Equivalent to the residual sum of squares normalized by size.

Ynp.array

Array of true labels

Y_hatnp.array

Array of predicted labels

float

Mean squared error of the prediction.

eds.metrics.r2_error(Y: numpy.array, Y_hat: numpy.array) → float¶

R2 score error of the prediction. See wiki for more info. Since it returns error, returns 1 - R2

Ynp.array

Array of true labels

Y_hatnp.array

Array of predicted labels

float

Error rate of the R2 score.

eds.metrics.roc_auc_error(Y: numpy.array, Y_hat: numpy.array) → float¶

Returns the error rate of the ROC AUC. In other words, 1 - ROC AUC

Ynp.array

Array of true labels

Y_hatnp.array

Array of predicted labels Important note: This should be a probability vector of probability that X’s label is the positive class.

float

Returns the error rate of the ROC AUC.
